Jason Rogers wrote:

 >
 > I haven't jumped on the BLOG bandwagon yet. What do you
 > think it brings to the table that an email group doesn't?
 > Is it a presentation issue (which could be a strength)? Are
 > there other strengths?
 >

My blog is more like a journal that cuts across a variety of topics, so 
it wouldn't fit well into any specific email group:

    http://www.clarkware.com/cgi/blosxom

Also, you can't post comments to my blog.  Some bloggers allow this for 
good reason, but I choose not to because, well, I don't want it to turn 
into an online forum. However, you can email me a private response or 
refer to my blog entry from your blog using trackback.  

Mike
